title: Welcome!
text: As a Senior Data Engineer, I am passionate about continuous learning and developing skills that are both intriguing and relevant to my profession. This website serves as a reference point for my experiences and contact information.

title: KotterCode
text:
Biography
I started my career in hospitality at Hotelschool The Hague, where I developed a strong foundation in delivering exceptional guest experiences and understanding the ins-and-outs of managing a business. This path gave me the chance to live and work in several countries.
Over time, my interest in driving informed decision making led me to pursue a Masterâ€™s in Business Analytics at UPF School of Management. Today, Iâ€™m a Senior Data Engineer with a focus on data integration, API development and automating data validation tools. At PALLAS, I lead a talented team of developers, working closely with contractors and stakeholders to streamline workflows and deliver projects that make a real impact.
